title: Generate automation code from a BDD test case
pageHeader: [Test code generation] Generate automation code from a BDD test case

prompt.examplePrompt:
I need to automate this BDD test case in Cucumber.js
Summary: Verify background color for header
Scenario:
Given IMR exists for employee
And user opens Test case generationIMR
When the Opportunities header loads
Then the Opportunities header background-color is #303240
prompt.sideEffectsOrComments:
Pros:
- Without deep knowledge, it could write autotest in different languages / frameworks
- Made less mistakes while automation
- Save a lot of time
- Know different ways how to automate the same case
Cons: 
- Need recheck
- Need connection to API for more correct and complete automation
Conclusion: Useful

assessment.comments: General how to question about creating test cases in Cucumber in JS

3.revisedPrompt:
Act as a Senior Software Development Engineer in Test. Generate automation code from the following BDD test case using Cucumber.js.
Summary: Verify background color for header
Scenario:
Given IMR exists for employee
And user opens IMR
When the Opportunities header loads
Then the Opportunities header background-color is #303240
3.changeLog: Rephrased the prompt to make it produce better results.

4.revisedPrompt:
Act as a Senior Software Development Engineer in Test. Generate automation code from the following BDD test case using '{{AUTOMATION_TOOL}}' and '{{PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE}}'.
{{BDD_TEST_CASE}}
sampleData:
BDD_TEST_CASE: Summary: Verify background color for header
Scenario:
Given IMR exists for employee
And user opens IMR
When the Opportunities header loads
Then the Opportunities header background-color is #303240

5.revisedPrompt: Act as a Senior Software Development Engineer in Test. Generate automation code from the BDD test case that is delimited by triple backticks. Use '{{AUTOMATION_TOOL}}' and '{{PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE}}'. ```{{BDD_TEST_CASE}}```
5.changeLog: Added more enhancements to the prompt.
sampleData:
BDD_TEST_CASE:
Feature: Verify background color for header

Scenario:
 Given IMR exists for employee
 And user opens IMR
 When the Opportunities header loads
 Then the Opportunities header background-color is #303240
